pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:5.1: 3. The training rule on slapping with the palm of the hand
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.2: At that time two nuns who were plagued by discontent entered their room and slapped their genitals with the palm of their hands.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.3: Hearing the sound, the nuns rushed to and asked them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.4: “Venerables, are you having sex with a man?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.5: “No, we’re not.” And they told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.8: “How can those nuns slap their genitals with their hands?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.9: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.12: “How can those nuns slap their genitals with their hands?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.13: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:6.14: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:7.1: ‘If a nun slaps with the palm of her hand, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:8.1: Slaps with the palm of her hand:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:8.2: if, consenting to the contact, she strikes her genitals, even with a lotus leaf, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:9.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc3:10.1: The third training rule is finished.
